Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: You can make movies for a select audience, but you have to market it to them

Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: For a romantic comedy to be three hours long, that's longer than most marriages

Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a disinterested student

Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: You won't see me on Barbara Walters; Oprah, that's not who I am

Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: I loved Luke Skywalker and I loved Darth Vader and I loved watching them work it out

Quote.Author: David Fincher
Quote.QuoteValue: How do you shoot a 150-day movie? You shoot it one day at a time

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a certain nostalgia and romance in a place you left

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think of myself as a really happy person

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a brooding melancholy that haunts me

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Cities produce in me melancholy or a tension I don't need

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Hemingway said the only way to write about a place is to leave it

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in Seattle, but I always knew I wanted to leave

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have relaxed into my persona as an author, although I used to fight that

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: My father is a practicing criminal law attorney in the Seattle area

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Post-modernism is dead because it didn't address human needs

Quote.Author: David Guterson
Quote.QuoteValue: Fiction is socially meaningful

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people know that I've got a good heart

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: We made sure nobody died on the show. We made sure nobody ever drowned on 'Baywatch.'

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're not in the game, you can't hit a home run

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: There are many dying children out there whose last wish is to meet me

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm six foot four, an all-American guy, and handsome and talented as well!

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like Elvis. Only alive

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: I look good, but I probably have the insides of Elvis

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: Ninety-nine percent of people now call me The Hoff - and it's out of respect

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: All I want to do is be onstage. A performer needs to perform

Quote.Author: David Hasselhoff
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't respect me you're not gonna get that respect back

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: Listening is a positive act: you have to put yourself out to do it

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: Enjoyment of the landscape is a thrill

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: I prefer living in color

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: Drawing is rather like playing chess: your mind races ahead of the moves that you eventually make

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: I draw flowers every day and send them to my friends so they get fresh blooms every morning

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: Drawing makes you see things clearer, and clearer and clearer still, until your eyes ache

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: Art has to move you and design does not, unless it's a good design for a bus

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: The moment you cheat for the sake of beauty, you know you're an artist

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very early riser, and I don't like to miss that beautiful early morning light

Quote.Author: David Hockney
Quote.QuoteValue: The photograph isn't good enough. It's not real enough

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: The life of man is of no greater importance to the universe than that of an oyster

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: Philosophy would render us entirely Pyrrhonian, were not nature too strong for it

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth springs from argument amongst friends

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: Scholastic learning and polemical divinity retarded the growth of all true knowledge

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: The law always limits every power it gives

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a just political maxim, that every man must be supposed a knave

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: A propensity to hope and joy is real riches; one to fear and sorrow real poverty

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: What a peculiar privilege has this little agitation of the brain which we call 'thought'

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: A purpose, an intention, a design, strikes everywhere even the careless, the most stupid thinker

Quote.Author: David Hume
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty, whether moral or natural, is felt, more properly than perceived

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way of removing negativity is to laugh and be joyous

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: A gift of truth is the gift of love

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: Today's mighty oak is just yesterday's nut, that held its ground

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: Humanity is mind-controlled and only slightly more conscious than your average zombie

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: Have you ever wondered what your subconscious mind looks like? Well today, I can show you

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: Infinite love is the only truth. Everything else is illusion

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: The Earth needs rebels!

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: Terms like 'good' and 'bad' are extremely simplistic in what is a far more complex situation

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: A group of reptilian humanoids, called the Babylonian Brotherhood, control humanity

Quote.Author: David Icke
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't edit information, I follow it

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is like girlfriends to me; I'm continually astonished by the choices other people make

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem with self-improvement is knowing when to quit

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: Rap is poetry to music, like beatniks without beards and bongos

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to jog but the ice cubes kept falling out of my glass

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not conceited. Conceit is a fault and I have no faults

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to have a drug problem, now I make enough money

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: The light you see at the end of the tunnel is the front of an oncoming train

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: The only thing I'm allergic to is criticism

Quote.Author: David Lee Roth
Quote.QuoteValue: He who knows how will always work for he who knows why

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: If it wasn't for the coffee, I'd have no identifiable personality whatsover

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's not a man, woman or child on the face of the earth who doesn't enjoy a tasty beverage

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no business like show business, but there are several businesses like accounting

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just trying to make a smudge on the collective unconscious

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: Fall is my favorite season in Los Angeles, watching the birds change color and fall from the trees

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot sing, dance or act; what else would I be but a talk show host

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no off position on the genius switch

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst tempered people I have ever met were those who knew that they were wrong

Quote.Author: David Letterman
Quote.QuoteValue: President Bush says he needs a month off to unwind. Unwind? When the hell does this guy wind?

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: This whole world is wild at heart and weird on top

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I love super crispy, almost burned, snapping-crispy bacon

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: Negativity is the enemy of creativity

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is very, very complicated, and so films should be allowed to be, too

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I like cappuccino, actually. But even a bad cup of coffee is better than no coffee at all

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: My cow is not pretty, but it is pretty to me

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: Francis Bacon is one of my giant inspirations. I just love him to pieces

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: The concept of absurdity is something I'm attracted to

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like Thomas Edison. I'm a fan of Nicolai Tesla

Quote.Author: David Lynch
Quote.QuoteValue: The ideas dictate everything, you have to be true to that or you're dead

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: What I value most in my friends is loyalty

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: Roll back the clock, and every possession of every great country started with a crime

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to write a good plot, it's very hard

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate the computer. I hate their spell-check. I won't ever do e-mail

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: Old age and treachery will always beat youth and exuberance

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: In a world we find terrifying, we ratify that which doesn't threaten us

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: We respond to a drama to that extent to which it corresponds to our dreamlife

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: A good film script should be able to do completely without dialogue

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: Always tell the truth - it's the easiest thing to remember

Quote.Author: David Mamet
Quote.QuoteValue: Every reiteration of the idea that nothing matters debases the human spirit

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: A nation that forgets its past can function no better than an individual with amnesia

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: Real success is finding you lifework in the work that you love

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: I would pay to do what I do if I had to

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: I love all sides of the work but that doesn't mean it isn't hard

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: Every book is a new journey. I never felt I was an expert on a subject as I embarked on a project

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: May none but honest and wise men ever rule under this roof

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: No harm's done to history by making it something someone would want to read

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't be a full participant in our democracy if you don't know our history

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm drawn particularly to stories that evolve out of the character of the protagonist

Quote.Author: David McCullough
Quote.QuoteValue: I work very hard on the writing, writing and rewriting and trying to weed out the lumber

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: Never stop testing, and your advertising will never stop improving

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: The consumer isn't a moron; she is your wife

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: Our business is infested with idiots who try to impress by using pretentious jargon

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: Ninety-nine percent of advertising doesn't sell much of anything

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: If it doesn't sell, it isn't creative

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: The more informative your advertising, the more persuasive it will be

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: What really decides consumers to buy or not to buy is the content of your advertising, not its form

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: A good advertisement is one which sells the product without drawing attention to itself

Quote.Author: David Ogilvy
Quote.QuoteValue: The advertisers who believe in the selling power of jingles have never had to sell anything

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: Every civilian's death diminishes us, collectively

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not a politician, and I will never be, and I say that with absolute conviction

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is a competitive endeavor

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to learn from our experiences and take responsibilities for our actions and drive on

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: The bottom line is, you really have to commit to something if you're going to be successful in it

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: Counter-insurgency, as you know, is a roller-coaster affair

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: I refuse to use terms like 'optimist' or 'pessimist' and instead prefer 'realist.'

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: Being in combat is not unending high-five moments

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: In counterinsurgency operations, the human terrain is the decisive terrain

Quote.Author: David Petraeus
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot kill or capture our way out of an industrial-strength insurgency

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to challenge myself. I like to learn - so I like to try new things and try to keep growing

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: It's really important to me not to be known as Ross when I'm 60

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I spend half my time just living my life, and the other half analyzing it

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I had a mustache when I was 13

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm fiercely loyal to my friends, and I really cherish my friendships

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: Can I tell you how strange it is to look in your rearview mirror and see guys in cars tailing you?

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't go anywhere without being recognized. I'm

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a geek in high school

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's something I want, I go for it. I just think about how I'm going to go for it

Quote.Author: David Schwimmer
Quote.QuoteValue: You're only as good as the sum of your parts, and one person can't be a team

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: I go to the movies at least five times a week, and after a while everything becomes a blur to me

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually I liked that 'Let the Right One In,' that Swedish vampire movie

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: What other people call dark and despairing, I call funny

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: I like listening to books as well, as that way you can iron at the same time

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: But I don't distinguish between being laughed with, and laughed at. I'll take either

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been keeping diaries for 27 years

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: Lovers of audio books learn to live with compromise

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: I always think it's a good policy to like the people who like you

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: No one writes dialect better than Flannery O'Connor. No one should even try

Quote.Author: David Sedaris
Quote.QuoteValue: As a foreigner in London, I like that there are so many other foreigners

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: In many senses, creativity and 'plagiarism' are nearly indivisible

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: All art is theft

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: We like non-fiction because we live in fictitious times

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: We hunger for connection to a larger community

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: Reality isn't straightforward or easily accessible

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just a totally selfish worker bee creating my little mini projects

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: Seattle has shaped me in a lot of ways

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: I really love that idea of the essay as an investigation. That's all anyone's life is

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: Collage is not a kitchen sink; it's not a refuge for the compositionally disabled

Quote.Author: David Shields
Quote.QuoteValue: I like art with a visible string to the world

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: We must reinvent a future free of blinders so that we can choose from real options

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: The voluntary approach to corporate social responsibility has failed in many cases

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: We have much to learn by studying nature and taking the time to tease out its secrets

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: Feeding our energy appetite is top of mind for many people these days

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: All those hours exploring the great outdoors made me more resilient and confident

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: More than a billion people lack adequate access to clean water

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: Just as human activity is upsetting Earth's carbon cycle, our actions are altering the water cycle

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: Plastic bags are bad and for the most part unnecessary

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: Birds are, especially canaries, are super sensitive to hydrogen sulfide and sour gas

Quote.Author: David Suzuki
Quote.QuoteValue: Geothermal can be a huge source of energy very quickly

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: The great poems are not about experience, but are the experience itself, felt in the body

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that human beings are desperate, always, to belong to something larger than themselves

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: Poetry gives us courage and sets us straight with the world. Poems are great companions and friends

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm working with German audiences, I will call on my Rilke and Goethe in the original

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: Poetry carries the imagery which is large enough for the kind of life we want for ourselves

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing about great poetry is we have no defenses against it

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: Stop trying to change reality by attempting to eliminate complexity

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not the thing you fear that you must deal with: it is the mother of the thing you fear

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: It is difficult to be creative and enthusiastic about anything for which we do not feel affection

Quote.Author: David Whyte
Quote.QuoteValue: The greatest luxury of having money should be not having to worry about it

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: You may all go to Hell, and I will go to Texas

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: Let your tongue speak what your heart thinks

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: Be always sure you are right - then go ahead

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: Throughout the day no time for memorandums now. Go ahead! Liberty and independence forever

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather be politically dead than hypocritically immortalized

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always supported measures and principles and not men

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: Look at my arms, you will find no party hand-cuff on them

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather be beaten, and be a man, than to be elected and be a little puppy dog

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: If one man in the country could take all the money, what was the use of passing any bills about it?

Quote.Author: Davy Crockett
Quote.QuoteValue: The party in power, like Jonah's gourd, grew up quickly, and will quickly fall

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big advocate of financial intelligence

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't have to work for a big corporation if you don't want to

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: Poor people put a low value on themselves and their efforts

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: A savvy entrepreneur will not always look for investment money, first

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: I consider each business investment based on concept and revenue

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: If I invest in a CEO, I need him or her to have experience in sales

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents always taught me that my day job would never make me rich; it'd be my homework

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: As an entrepreneur, you never stop learning

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: I've failed way more than I've succeeded

Quote.Author: Daymond John
Quote.QuoteValue: Mentors, by far, are the most important aspects of businesses

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: Every once in a while, a new technology, an old problem, and a big idea turn into an innovation

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want to think about how many people have thought or still think that I'm crazy

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a human entropy producer

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: If history is any indication, all truths will eventually turn out to be false

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're going to fail, you might as well fail at the big ones

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: The city needs a car like a fish needs a bicycle

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing that has value, real value, has no cost. Not freedom, not food, not shelter, not healthcare

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm told absolutely no, it's a definite maybe

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest failure is I have too many to talk about

Quote.Author: Dean Kamen
Quote.QuoteValue: New ideas in technology are literally a dime-a-dozen, or cheaper than that

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes there is no darker place than our thoughts, the moonless midnight of the mind

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: When tempest tossed, embrace chaos

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: Human beings can always be relied upon to exert, with vigor, their God-given right to be stupid

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing gives us courage more readily than the desire to avoid looking like a damn fool

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: Civilization rests on the fact that most people do the right thing most of the time

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: What we do as a society is seek simple answers

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the world is full of evil people. I think in some ways we're in more danger now than before

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: Each reader needs to bring his or her own mind and heart to the text

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: If I drive myself to the brink of my ability, then I don't get stale or bored

Quote.Author: Dean Koontz
Quote.QuoteValue: I do give books as gifts sometimes, when people would rather have one than a new Ferrari

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: What matters most is your overall way of eating and living

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: Joy of living is sustainable; fear of dying is not

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: I never give up hope

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: An educated patient is empowered; thus, more likely to become healthy

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: Make choices to empower yourself

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: Physical exercise is a great way to discharge stressful feelings that accumulate during the day

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: Even more than feeling healthy, most people want to feel free and in control

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: Lifestyle changes may slow, stop, or even reverse the progression of early-stage prostate cancer

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: If we're not careful, we become that which we most fear

Quote.Author: Dean Ornish
Quote.QuoteValue: Too much power in any institution tends to stifle innovation

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to choose faith even if we don't feel it. Or hold on to a friend who has faith

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Congruence, integration, responsibility and integrity are the values that I stand for

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that any time of great pain is a time of transformation, a fertile time to plant new seeds

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Your soul's desires compel you to grow, evolve and move closer to your highest potential

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Compassion is the key to living outside the confines of your lower self

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: God's will can become your internal reference point from this day forward; it is your choice

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: Devotion begins at home, inside your own awareness

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I define God as an energy - a spiritual energy. It has no denomination. It has no judgments

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up very insecure. From the time I was little I used to hide under my mother's dress

Quote.Author: Debbie Ford
Quote.QuoteValue: We were birthed with one soul to take care of, and we must take care of it

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: Being hot never hurts!

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: The only person I really believe in is me

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't mind if my skull ends up on a shelf as long as it's got my name on it

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: I've had some lovely extraordinary experiences on New Year's Eve

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a culture vulture, and I just want to experience it all

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of regrets, but I'm not going to think of them as regrets

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: Lately I've been believing that music predates speech

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: Capote wrote every day. He said that's the only way, you have to sit down every day and do it

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: Music is wonderful. Especially if there's some kind of content to it

Quote.Author: Debbie Harry
Quote.QuoteValue: Something's that written out is okay, but it's not always a clear indication of what a person means

Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I gave it all that I had, and it's gratifying that others seem to be receiving it so well

Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: You just never give up. You do a task to the best of your abilities and beyond

Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanted to get that sense of peace and even boredom that comes with long familiarity

Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: You all know who she is. There's very little she isn't

Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I want happiness for my daughter - I want Carrie to be happy
